messages.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This will also delete all {{children}}. This action cannot be undone.
messages.confirmDeleteWorkspace: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This will also delete all boards, lists, and cards in this workspace. This action cannot be undone.
messages.confirmDeleteBoard: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This will also delete all lists and cards in this board. This action cannot be undone.
messages.confirmDeleteList: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This will also delete all cards in this list. This action cannot be undone.
